name: txunii
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3))), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c3, ctop))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 × c1)= ⋃(c2[tX]c3), c2 ∈ Top, c3 ∈ Top)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3)))
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wcel(c3, ctop)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c3, ctop)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3)))
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wcel(c3, ctop)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c3, ctop)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c3, ctop)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3))))
-| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cuni(co(c2, ctx, c3)))
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wcel(c3, ctop)
-| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c3))

comment: The underlying set of the product of two topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.)
